user.description: Set up your Apprise notification service.

data_description.name: The notifier will bind to the action `notify.NAME`.
data_description.config: One or more Apprise Configuration URLs.

deprecated_yaml_import_connection_error.title: {domain} YAML configuration import failed
deprecated_yaml_import_connection_error.description:
There was an error connecting to Apprise when trying to import the YAML configuration.

Ensure the YAML configuration is correct and restart Home Assistant to try again or remove the {domain} configuration from your `configuration.yaml` file and continue to [set up the integration]({url}) manually.
